The nova.tests.integrated.test_servers Module¶

class ServersTest(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: nova.tests.integrated.integrated_helpers._IntegratedTestBase

test_create_and_delete_server()¶

Creates and deletes a server.

test_create_and_rebuild_server()¶

Rebuild a server with metadata.

test_create_multiple_servers()¶

Creates multiple servers and checks for reservation_id

test_create_server_with_error()¶

Create a server which will enter error state.

test_create_server_with_metadata()¶

Creates a server with metadata.

test_deferred_delete()¶

Creates, deletes and waits for server to be reclaimed.

test_deferred_delete_force()¶

Creates, deletes and force deletes a server.

test_deferred_delete_restore()¶

Creates, deletes and restores a server.

test_get_servers()¶

Simple check that listing servers works.

test_rename_server()¶

Test building and renaming a server.
